tile.name: Pyramid
tile.flavor: You find a pyramid and cautiously search for treasure - except the pyramid is a hideout for thugs and they demand tribute.

tile.name: Tower
tile.flavor: You've found a dragon tower, but the dragon is out. You quickly grab a bit of the dragon's hoard and run away.

tile.name: Crater
tile.flavor: You search the crater for valuables, but you get ambushed by bandits.

tile.name: Palace gates
tile.flavor: You meet a nobleman leaving the palace, he pities you and gives you a handout.

tile.name: Cold desert
tile.flavor: The cold night in the desert is hard. You pay a traveling nomad for food and drink.

tile.name: Walled city
tile.flavor: You assist a warband marauding against the city and get a share of the plunder.

tile.name: Monastery
tile.flavor: You spend the day with accommodating monks. They give you food and shelter.

tile.name: Black cave
tile.flavor: You delve into the cave, but get spooked by a sudden movement. As you flee, you drop your purse.

tile.name: Huts in the mountain
tile.flavor: The village worships you and makes a sacrifice of \"wealth\". You sell off the junk for a bit of change.

tile.name: The Werewall (werewolf-wall)
tile.flavor: You spend a night howling with your new friends. Feeling invigorated, you rush on.

tile.name: The Pit
tile.flavor: You bet on fights at The Pit. Unfortunately, you're bad at betting.

tile.name: Goldmine
tile.flavor: You see an unguarded mine cart at the goldmine. You quickly and successfully scamper off with the contents.
